cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import xgboost as xgb
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
import lightgbm as lgb

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size (SibSp + Parch)
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch']
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch']

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Miss, Master)
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr', 'Rev': 'Rev', 'Col': 'Col', 'Major': 'Major',
        'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Mme': 'Mrs', 'Don': 'Mr', 'Sir': 'Mr',
        'Lady': 'Mrs', 'Capt': 'Capt', 'Countess': 'Mrs', 'Jonkheer': 'Mr'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Map rare titles to 'Rare'
title_counts = train_df['Title'].value_counts()
train_df['Title'] = train_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: 'Rare' if x not in title_counts.index[:5] else x)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Title'].apply(lambda x: 'Rare' if x not in title_counts.index[:5] else x)

# 5. Encode embarked (fill missing with mode)
embarked_mode = train_df['Embarked'].mode()[0]
train_df['Embarked'] = train_df['Embarked'].fillna(embarked_mode)
test_df['Embarked'] = te
